issuetype.description: A user story. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.
issuetype.name: Story

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
As a Cloud developer, I would like ELB agent (servo) uses SWF to communicate with the ELB service so that it can uses the common SWF-based design patterns in building in-vm distributed services and improves ELB scalability (by using SWF long-poll).

NOTE: the completion of the story may not implement an end-to-end ELB functionality; rather the story will implement the basic SWF activities running in the VMs and the activities will control the existing ELB agent functionalities.

comments.body: To verify, make sure ELBs functional, meaning that application traffics are forwarded to backend instances.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.0-0.25788.147.20170202git6e5a63d.el7}}

*Steps*

# Create Eucalyptus VPC cloud with multiple availability zones - [hspencer-400-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/400/]
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones --region euca-admin@
AVAILABILITYZONE	black-dollar	available
AVAILABILITYZONE	black-market	available
AVAILABILITYZONE	port-of-miami	available
{code}
# Create non-eucalyptus account (example {{development-operations}}) via {{euare-accountcreate}}
# Bundle, upload and register Ubuntu Xenial HVM EMI:
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# euca-describe-images --region devops-admin@
IMAGE	emi-63ef779d	ubuntu-xenial-x86_64-hvm-20170203/xenial-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.manifest.xml	000727120439	available	public	x86_64	machine			instance-store	hvm
{code}
# Using linked {{cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json}} template, deploy stack:
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# euform-create-stack ELBASGStack --template-file cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter ImageId=emi-63ef779d --parameter KeyName=devops-admin --parameter EndPoint=http://cloudformation.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --parameter MinSize=3 --parameter MaxSize=6 --region devops-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000727120439:stack/ELBASGStack/1dc36806-f578-45f7-bfb2-c1e094a396b2
[root@h-04 ~]# euform-describe-stacks ELBASGStack --region devops-admin@
STACK	ELBASGStack	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack with ELB access logging in Eucalyptus VPC	2017-02-16T19:08:38.885Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-63ef779d
PARAMETER	KeyName		devops-admin
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		3
PARAMETER	MaxSize		6
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	elbasgstack-s3loggingbucket-yxcqzd0vbm80s
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://ELBASGSta-NginxELB-IV1SSYS1GTVW2-000727120439.lb.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
